pkgmetadata.longdescription: Blender is for 3D modeling, animation, rendering, post-production, interactive creation and playback.

use.flag: Add support for Alembic through media-gfx/alembic used as an animation interchange format.
Enable address sanitiation. This is only for bug and vulnerability discovery only. It does not necessarily prevent when activated.

Enables using componenents that may depend on Boost such as Blender player (2.7 only), Cycles GPU rendering, Cycles network rendering, game engine (2.7 only), JACK (2.7 only), nls (multilanguage support), OpenAL, OpenVDB, color-management. Disabling implies reducing bloat and heavy Boost dependency and faster build times.
Builds Blender for render farms. Disables windowing and audio.
Builds Blender for redistribution. Makes use of static libraries.
Add support for Collada interchange format through media-libs/opencollada.
Enables support for BMI optimizations if cpudetection is disabled.
Enables support for LZCNT optimization if cpudetection is disabled.
Detect at build time the SIMD instruction sets for cycles.
Build the Cycles renderer with NVIDIA® CUDA® support.
Build the Cycles renderer (requires media-libs/openimageio and dev-libs/boost).

Support for newer GPUs (EXPERIMENTAL/IN DEVELOPMENT) </flag
Enable experimental peer-to-peer LAN networking support for Cycles.
Adds themed cursor support for Wayland support.
Adds DDS textures support to Blender.
Build C and Python API documentation directly from the source code.
Adds Draco Compression support for glTF.
Details: https://docs.blender.org/manual/en/latest/addons/import_export/scene_gltf2.html#compression
Adds surface fluid simulation to Blender using El'Beem library.
Builds with PGO optimizations. Only CPU side code will benefit.
Build cycles renderer with Embree support as a CPU ray accelerator.
Adds support for FLAC lossless audio support.
Adds Intersect (Knife) and Intersect (Boolean) to Face Tools, and the ability to switch between fast and the default exact solver modes for the mesh modifier. It adds support for exact booleans with overlapping geometry support than fast float approximations without overlapping geometry support.
Details: https://docs.blender.org/manual/en/latest/modeling/modifiers/generate/booleans.html#boolean-modifier https://docs.blender.org/manual/en/latest/modeling/meshes/editing/face/intersect_knife.html https://docs.blender.org/manual/en/latest/modeling/meshes/editing/face/intersect_boolean.html
Adds support for FFMPEG enabling internal FFMPEG codecs support and possibly external codec support if added.
Adds support for primarily AMD GPUs via the HIP render device with the Cycles renderer.
Adds support for a joystick through SDL used for the Blender Game Engine (BGE, 2.79.x only).
Enable features depending on llvm.
Build against llvm:13 to avoid multiple libLLVM.so load bug. This must correspond to the same LLVM linked to the system's Mesa.
Build against llvm:14 to avoid multiple libLLVM.so load bug. This must correspond to the same LLVM linked to the system's Mesa.
(Not officially supported upstream, but provided for distro compatibility) [EXPERIMENTAL]
Build against llvm:15 to avoid multiple libLLVM.so load bug. This must correspond to the same LLVM linked to the system's Mesa.
Build and install man pages.
Adds support for GPU accelerated volume based rendering for cycles.
Enable NDOF (3D Mouse) input device (SpaceNavigator and friends) support.
Use the NVCC compiler for CUDA®/Optix™ support.
Use NVRTC to build the cubin compiler for CUDA® support.
Adds 3D sound support.
Adds support for the Opus audio codec used for speech compression and general use.
Allow OpenCL™ Graphics Acceleration. This may require extra graphics card drivers.
Enable Open Image Denoise support for CPU based AI denoising for improved blending.
Enable OpenImageIO Support
Accelerates the subdivision rendering to produce smoother curved 3D surfaces with the use of GPU and CPU.
Add GPU preview rendering.
Add VR features.
Build cycles renderer with NVIDIA® OptiX™ support on Quadro®/GeForce RTX™ GPUs for hardware accelerated rendering and denoising.
Add support for OpenShadingLanguage scripting.
Adds support to export to PDF directly.
Add support for converting bitmaps into a grease pencil line for smoother edges.
Builds Blender with the release configuration (AKA precompiled Blender), with a subset of the release configuration but allows for flexibility. Otherwise, it falls back to the platform default.
* Hard USE requirements are for formats and quality standards. * Flexible requirements are for (proprietary) performance libs or driver support.
The hard USE requirements are to ensure compatibility and render quality consistency with render farms.
Enables using TBB componenents which also may enable sculpt multithreading, Cycles, El'Beem, OpenImageDenoise, OpenVDB.
Build the provided unit tests.
Adds theora for video output.
Allows to export certain types of selected visible meshes to USD format.
Adds support for WebM preset with dependency checks.
Adds vorbis as an audio output format.
Add support for memory debugging using dev-util/valgrind
Adds support for VP9 for video output.
Adds support for x264 for video output.
Checks for X11 dependencies.
Adds support for the Xvid codec to render and output MPEG-4 video.
Ebuild revision. FOR INTERNAL USE ONLY. Bumps the revision while keeping CCACHE paths for faster rebuilds.
